description: A string is a basic Lua type, it represents a sequence of characters.

blocks.text: A string is a basic Lua type, it represents a sequence of characters. They are initialized with double quotes framing characters.

blocks.code:
local s = "hello world"

print(s) -- prints "hello world"

blocks.text: Strings can be concatenated with the `..` operator.

blocks.code:
local a = "hello"
local b = "world"
local c = a .. " " .. b

print(c) -- prints "hello world"
